Class ChaCha20IETFPoly1305Segment

java.lang.Object
no.uio.ifi.crypt4gh.pojo.body.Segment
no.uio.ifi.crypt4gh.pojo.body.ChaCha20IETFPoly1305Segment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Crypt4GHEntity, EncryptableEntity
public class ChaCha20IETFPoly1305Segment extends Segment implements EncryptableEntity
Data segment, ChaCha20 encrypted, 65564 bytes long (according to the current spec).
